snippet: U.S. regulators have charged two companies and three individuals with operating a pyramid scheme that made some $129 million from preying on investors in China, Taiwan and the U.S....

headline.print_headline: SEC Alleges $129M Pyramid Scheme in China, US
headline.main: SEC Alleges $129M Pyramid Scheme in China, US

lead_paragraph: U.S. regulators have charged two companies and three individuals with operating a pyramid scheme that made some $129 million from preying on investors in China, Taiwan and the U.S.
